author: schneiml
body:
Various changes from the last weeks. Highlights include:

* @jkarancs `SiPixelCoordinates`, which is used to add the "PixelMap" type plots. Very rough for now, but looks good.
* More changes to the DQM contents and organization, due to @fioriNTU and myself.
* Improved `SiPixelPhase1TrackEfficiency` plugin. Now uses `TProfile` to do the efficiency computation (thanks to @jkarancs again for this trick!) and no more harvesting step is needed. Also does a bit more track propagation now. Per-ROC efficiency exists now but has to be validated.
* Consequently, the "custom harvesting" functionality was removed from the `HistogramManager`. Nobody (including myself) understood how to use it anyways.
* Various bugfixes around the `SpecificationBuilder`. It now can serve as a useful piece of documentation on how the Phase1 DQM really works.
* Improved test config in `SiPixelPhase1Config/test`, now does Tracking and Pixel offline DQM, while still running much faster than runTheMatrix and with online GUI/live support.

This work is based on the 2016-12-14 IB, since some later version broke reading 810 or pre1 RelVal files. Maybe just needs some config flags but easier to test on the old version.

Recipe here: https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMS/PixelDQMPhaseI#A_Phase1_MC_Data_online_setup

CC @davidcarbonis @lunik1 @leggat
title: Phase1 Pixel DQM Christmas Version
